TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RibbonMenuButton extends System.Windows.Controls.Menu

Docs.summary: Represents a button on the ribbon that displays a drop-down menu when clicked.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following illustration shows examples of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton> controls in large, medium, and small variations, and with no images.
![Ribbon menu button controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton.png "Ribbon menu button controls") Ribbon menu button controls
The following illustrations show <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton> controls when the drop-down is opened.
![Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton-selection.png "Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open") Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open
![Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton-selection2.png "Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open") Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open
## Examples The following example shows the markup to create a menu button with three available items.
[!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonMenuButton](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbonmenubutton)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.KeyTip : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.
Docs.value: The keyboard shortcut for the control. The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

Docs.summary: Provides class handling for the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method closes the menu drop-down and then marks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlService.DismissPopup> attached event as handled so that the parent drop-down is not closed.

member this.ToolTipDescription : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip for this control.
Docs.value: The descriptive text to display in the ToolTip. The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > Each ribbon control inherits a property.
